sources.title: Looney Tunes - Computer Colorized Cartoons
sources.description: A nearly complete collection of almost all computer-colored copies of the originally produced black and white Looney Tunes cartoons, the only shorts missing from this collection are "Boom Boom" (1936), the uncensored version of "Porky The Fireman" (1938), "Kristopher Kolumbus Jr." (1939), "Porky's Ant" (1941), "Robinson Crusoe, Jr." (1941) and "Confusions Of A Nutzy Spy" (1943). The recordings come from Tooncast Latin America, Cartoon Network USA, Europe, Brazil and Latin America, Boomerang Italy, The Looney Tunes Channel, Canal 13 (Guatemala), ATV (Peru), RSI LA1 (Italy), Nickelodeon USA, one of Canal 5 from Mexico and one or another from some DVD
